scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev --prefix experts-man" "npm run dev:local --prefix backend"
scripts.dev:cf: npx concurrently "npm run dev --prefix experts-man" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix experts-man && npx wrangler pages deploy experts-man/dist --project-name=expertsman && npm run deploy --prefix backend
